about_the_game:
DEMO VERSION:


Demo version shows only a small part of full game. It contains a part of the Soviet Campaign. Two game factions. Sandbox mode in Single Player. Multiplayer mode opened for a limited time.

FULL VERSION:


WHAT IS TOTAL TANK SIMULATOR


Develop a mighty army, control all the units, shape the battlefield.
Total Tank Simulator is a physics based simulator game. Get hooked on massive battles, total destruction and think carefully about the next move you make, because outcome of the battle depends only on you!

TURN THE TIDE OF THE WAR


Become a commander who changed history! Take part in single player campaign based on historical events of Second World War. Manage your army, take part in countless battles and decide about a faith of Europe!

EVERY BATTLE IS UNIQUE


From tanks to aircrafts, from infantry to super secret projects, all of them have their purpose,and there are 200+ of them, seriously - check them out!
You won’t run out of maps either. With more than 150 unique maps you will never know if your next battle is going to be held in the streets of Berlin, deep in Sahara desert, or in snowy plains of Russian Tajga.

SANDBOX


Do whatever you want, think of most ridiculous scenarios and recreate them in sandbox mode. The only thing limiting you here is your imagination (and CPU :)).

GET AHEAD OF EVERYONE IN MULTIPLAYER MODE


Prove your tactical skills skirmishing with players around the world. Manage your armies and demolish other players in various different game modes.

IF YOU CAN SEE IT, YOU CAN INTERACT WITH IT


All the terrain is destructible. Shape your battlefield with never ending artillery fire! Moreover you can take control of every unit. You can fly, drive, or command an infantry squad. Hell, you can sit at the wheel of the most ludacris vehicles ever thought of during Second World War.

short_description: Total Tank Simulator is a physics-based WW2 game. Experience WW2 like never before. Play with tanks, planes, cannons, infantry and much more. Deploy your units before the battle and issue orders. Watch the battle or take control over every unit on the battlefield.
